name: CurrentSounds
0:
”Alexa open Current Sounds”
”Alexa ask Current Sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: current sounds
des:
Dive into the gentle and rhythmic sounds of flowing water currents. Whether for relaxation, meditation, or sleep, these sounds will create a peaceful aquatic atmosphere, reminiscent of rivers and ocean currents.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Current Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
